thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: SK

author: SK
title: SK
text: Easy way to get the books I want. Most of the books come as advertised. Only a few books have been in worse shape then advertised or damage in shipping and Thift books has immediately sent replacements. The customer service is terrific. Since the local used bookstores are closing this is the way to get books. I don't like to get hardback library books. I am never 100% sure they were not stolen.
